name: Nadir v1.1
description:
Originally made on scratch- https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/709327892

WASD to Move 

Space or click to shoot 

Mouse to aim 

Every other time you kill an enemy, you get to add another turret. The game starts when it finds 3 other players that are also trying to start a game, and there is currently no end to each game. 

There is some delay between picking a turret and actually adding it- this was to fix a bug.

Credit to @ggenije for the text engine 

Big thanks to @railgunking2 for the recoil program, ideas for the game, and some bug fixing 

Thanks to @Kenichi10B for the distance between coordinates program 

Other than that, all art, programming, and ideas by me. 

Some inspiration came from diep.io 

Explosion came from google 

Currently in testing phase, please tell me any bugs/suggestions.
